metadata.title: CVE-2021-4099 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Swiftshader in Google Chrome prior to 96.0.4664.110allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
